pair.Prompt: What was the case of Minneapolis & St. Louis R. Co. v. U.S. about?
pair.Response: Response: Minneapolis & St. Louis R. Co. v. U.S. was a case about rival applications by several rail carriers to the Interstate Commerce Commission under ยง 5 (2) of the Interstate Commerce Act for authority to acquire control of Toledo, Peoria & Western Railroad Company. The case was heard in October Term, 1959 and the opinion of the Court was delivered by MR. JUSTICE WHITTAKER.
